content: this charming charma neck warmer pattern is inspired my mother charma she doesn t care for the bulkiness of a long scarf so i thought this would be a great alternative you can also wear it around all day when it s chilly and easily zip up a jacket over it for the outdoors the lacey edging really makes it such a cute piece the pattern is written for medium worsted weight yarn and bulky weight yarn and uses a size i crochet hook
